text: MSsQ] Which of the following statement(s) is/ are correct? (2) DELETE operation can be rolled back, but TRUNCATE and DROP operations cannot be rolled back. (b) DELETE operation cannot be rolled back, but TRUNCATE and DROP operations can be rolled back. () DELETE is an example of DML (Data Manipulation Language), but TRUNCATE and DROP are the examples of DDL (Data Definition Language). (d) DELETE, TRUNCATE and DROP all are an example of DML
